org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces
Interface Properties

@BusInterface(name="org.freedesktop.DBus.Properties")
public interface Properties

The standard org.freedesktop.DBus.Properties interface that can be implemented by bus objects to expose a generic "setter/getter" inteface for user-defined properties on DBus.

Method Summary
 Variant Get(String iface, String propName)
          Gets a property that exists on a named interface of a bus object.
 Map<String,Variant> GetAll(String iface)
          Gets all properties for a given interface.
 void Set(String iface, String propName, Variant value)
          Sets a property that exists on a named interface of a bus object.
 

Method Detail

Get

@BusMethod
Variant Get(String iface,
                      String propName)
            throws BusException
Gets a property that exists on a named interface of a bus object.

Parameters:
iface - the interface that the property exists on
propName - the name of the property
Returns:
the value of the property
Throws:
BusException - if the named property doesn't exist

Set

@BusMethod
void Set(String iface,
                   String propName,
                   Variant value)
         throws BusException
Sets a property that exists on a named interface of a bus object.

Parameters:
iface - the interface that the property exists on
propName - the name of the property
value - the value for the property
Throws:
BusException - if the named property doesn't exist or cannot be set

GetAll

@BusMethod(signature="s",
           replySignature="a{sv}")
Map<String,Variant> GetAll(String iface)
                           throws BusException
Gets all properties for a given interface.

Parameters:
iface - the interface
Returns:
a Map of name/value associations
Throws:
BusException - if request cannot be honored
